<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 266 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You can use the [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) activity to create [snares](/equipment/snares). When you select this feat, you add the formulas for four common snares to your formula book.

<title level="2">Snare Crafting leads to...</title>
[Big Game Trapper](/Feats.aspx?ID=3426), [Snare Commando](/Feats.aspx?ID=2388), [Snare Genius](/Feats.aspx?ID=1278), [Snare Hopping](/Feats.aspx?ID=1766), [Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506), [Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2074), [Vicious Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=2391)
name: Snare Crafting
